mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_no , board_no , mem_id , reply_content ) values(seq_reply.nextval,#{board_no},#{mem_id},#{reply_content})
mapper.select: select r.reply_no , r.board_no , r.mem_id , r.reply_content , r.reply_date , r.reply_updatedate , m.mem_nickname , m.mem_img from reply r , member m where board_no = ${board_no} and m.mem_id = r.mem_id order by reply_no
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{reply_content} , reply_updatedate = sysdate where reply_no = #{reply_no}
